com.karacasoft.cardboardui.view.adapter

Class BaseAdapter3D<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.karacasoft.cardboardui.view.adapter.BaseAdapter3D<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SampleListAdapter

    public abstract class BaseAdapter3D<T>
extends java.lang.Object

    Base AdapterView Adapter class.

    Subclasses must implement getView(int) method. You may want to include your onTrigger callbacks in your implementation.

    Check SampleListAdapter example.

    Created by Karaca on 5/28/2015.
